title: ЛАПТОП LENOVO LEGION SLIM 5 16IRH8 16" I7-13700H/16GB DDR5/1TB/RTX 4060 8GB

features.Resolution: (2560x1600) WQXGA, IPS, 300nits Anti-glare, 100% sRGB, 165Hz, G-SYNC®, Low Blue Light
features.Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4060 8GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 2370MHz, TGP 125W
features.Audio: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3287 codec
features.Speakers: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Nahimic Audio
features.USB Ports: 1x USB 3.2 Gen 2, 1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 (Always On), 1x USB-C® 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer and DisplayPort™ 1.4), 1x USB-C® 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer, Power Delivery 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4)
